channel.title: Prayer?
channel.description:
Hey guys, I was wondering if anyone here knows how to fix prayer. My prayer protect spells are working fine, but the emblem above my head isn't. Here are some pictures to let you know what i mean:
Protect From Melee:
[img]http://i50.tinypic.com/idsmrr.jpg[/img]
Protect From Range:
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/110yo0m.jpg[/img]
Protect From Mage:
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/vffj40.jpg[/img]
As you can see, The picutres are all wrong, and for mage there isn't even anything, its just empty. If anyone Knows how to fix this, that would be greatly appreciated. Thanx!
Note: if this is supposed to be under client help, and not server help, i'll be happy to move it. =]

item.title: Prayer?
item.dc:creator: @kool_dude567 kool dude567
item.description:
@kool_dude567 wrote:

thanks for the code, but you didn’t specify on where to actually put it? which file? and where in the file? if you could that would be great![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 12, 2009, 08:52:22 am[/size][hr]also im using bluur’s client if that will help at all.

If this helps anyone, well here it goes… i just found it in my server’s client.java while looking around…

public void checkHead(){ if(!isSkulled){ headIcon = 0; } if(isSkulled){ headIcon = 0; } } public void getHead(){ //LOL if(ProtMage && !isSkulled) headIcon = 4; if(ProtRange && !isSkulled) headIcon = 2; if(ProtMelee && !isSkulled) headIcon = 1; if(Retribution && !isSkulled) headIcon = 8; if(Redemption && !isSkulled) headIcon = 32; if(Smite && !isSkulled) headIcon = 16; if(ProtMage && isSkulled) headIcon = 4; if(ProtRange && isSkulled) headIcon = 2; if(ProtMelee && isSkulled) headIcon = 1; if(Retribution && isSkulled) headIcon = 8; if(Redemption && isSkulled) headIcon = 32; if(Smite && isSkulled) headIcon = 16; else if(!ProtMage && !ProtRange && !ProtMelee && !Retribution && !Redemption && !Smite) skulls = 1; } public void turnOffHead(){ if(ProtMage) headIcon = 4; if(ProtRange) headIcon = 2; if(ProtMelee) headIcon = 1; if(Retribution) headIcon = 8; if(Redemption) headIcon = 32; if(Smite) headIcon = 16; else if(!isSkulled && !ProtMage && !ProtRange && !ProtMelee && !Retribution && !Redemption && !Smite) headIcon = 0; }

hope that can help someone with my headicons. Thanks guys. Please help if you can!

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer?
item.dc:creator: @Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP wrote:

[code]if (meleePrayer) {
getHead() = 1;
}

if (rangePrayer) {
getHead() = 2;
}

if (magePrayer) {
getHead() = 3;
}

if (retribution) {
getHead() = 4;
}

if (smite) {
getHead() = 5;
}[/code]

Read full topic
